title: Perplexity accused of scraping websites that explicitly blocked AI scraping
what_happened: Internet giant Cloudflare says it detected Perplexity crawling and scraping websites, even after customers had added technical blocks telling Perplexity not to scrape their pages.
technical_angle: The article highlights technical implications involving AI systems, infrastructure, or data practices that directly affect how AI models are trained, deployed, or governed.
why_it_matters_for_ai_pros: AI professionals should pay attention due to its impact on system design, model deployment decisions, ethical considerations, or infrastructure scaling.
primary_risk: Legal action, reputational damage, and dataset contamination
primary_opportunity: Develop compliant data collection and audit pipelines

title: Data centers love solar: Here’s a comprehensive guide to deals over 100 megawatts
